page.title: 09Libraries
page.content: New Mill Library is opposite the White Hart on the A616 Sheffield to Huddersfield Road.It is a small prefabricated building with a lawn at the front and car-park to the rear. The Library opens daily from 2.p.m.to 7.30 p.m.with half hour closing from 5to 5.30. It does not open on Wednesday and opens from 10.a.m.to 1.p.m on Saturday. There are 2 staff.It houses 8,500 books catalogued on microfilm 650 of these are changed from Central Stock every 8 weeks.There is also a small reference section. Leaflets advertise local events. An average of 240 people per week use the Library.Even if they only chat with the Librarian this small building provides a useful social and recreational facility.
